column3: - Deleting the outdated test-patches: trivial ACK\n- Moving `gen_base58_test_vectors.py`: are these (conditionally) invoked anywhere in the build system? (if so, they belong in `share` instead, dev scripts aren't currently part of the tarball)\n
@laanwj not within bitcoin but this would break external (hot)links. So better leaving this as is.\n
